p:
Compound peak areas were individually integrated from MS data on selected ion monitoring (SIM) mode and processed, and P app values were calculated by the following equation
where V R is the volume in the receiver chamber, A is the surface area of the monolayer, C 0 is the initial concentration in the donor chamber (apical) at 0 min, and d C/d T is the steady-state linear rate of change of concentration in the receiver chamber (basal) (μg/sec). The rate of drug transport was calculated by linear regression analysis using Microsoft Excel 2016 software (Microsoft Corporation, Redmond, WA). All data were presented as mean ± SD in cm/s × 10 –6.
